inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: BMI at or above the 95th percentile for children of the same age and sex

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Testicular volume ≥ 6 ml Prader (M) and Tanner III breast development or greater (F)

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 12- 18 years regardless of gender, race or economic circumstance

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: HbA1C between 5.7 - 6.4% as defined by the American Diabetes Association (ADA)

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 25-OH vitamin D level less than 20 ng/ml (50 nmol/liter)

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to comply with study protocol requirements
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Subjects must be willing to comply with study protocol requirements

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to comply with study protocol requirements
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Treatment on medication known to effect vitamin D, calcium and glucose metabolism
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: glucocorticoids, thiazolidinediones, metformin, anticonvulsants metabolized through cytochrome P-450 (phenytoin, carbamazepine, phenobarbital, sodium valproate)

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Subjects will be excluded from the study if they have taken any form of vitamin D supplementation greater than 400 IU daily in the preceding 3 months.

notes: A 42-year-old healthy woman with no underlying disease, regular exercise, and no history of allergies. She is married and uses barrier methods of contraception.
